scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && if not exist dist\frontend mkdir dist\frontend && (xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\dist\* dist\frontend\ 2>nul || xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\build\* dist\frontend\ 2>nul || echo Frontend build not found)
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx tsc && cd .. && if not exist dist\backend mkdir dist\backend && (xcopy /E /I /Y backend\dist\* dist\backend\ 2>nul || xcopy /E /I /Y backend\build\* dist\backend\ 2>nul || echo Backend build not found)
